meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6022.

td.p: Hans von Walter, a junior from Southern Adventist University from Avon Park, Florida
Ellen Eichner, a junior from the Ohio State University from Northbrook, Illinois
Steve Greene, a senior from UCLA from Elk Grove, California

tr.td: INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE
& THE OSCAR GOES TO...
WHAT KIND OF PAINT YOU USING?
TEACHING ASSISTANCE
ENVIRONMENTALISM
GLEE
